## Notification.(constructor)

Creates instance of Notification

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(message: string, type: NotificationType);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | <code>string</code> | Message displayed by notification |
|  type | <code>NotificationType</code> | Type of notification message |
